001package org.nasdanika.drawio.emf;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.io.OutputStream;
006import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
007import java.io.Writer;
008import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.stream.Stream;
011
012import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
013import javax.xml.transform.TransformerException;
014
015import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
016import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
017import org.nasdanika.common.NasdanikaException;
018import org.nasdanika.common.URIEncodable;
019import org.nasdanika.drawio.Document;
020import org.nasdanika.graph.processor.emf.GraphProcessorResource;
021import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
022
023/**
024 * Loads {@link EObject}s from Drawio {@link Document}s. 
025 * @author Pavel
026 *
027 */
028public abstract class DrawioResource<P, T extends EObject> extends GraphProcessorResource<P, T> implements URIEncodable {
029        
030        protected Document document;
031        
032        protected DrawioResource(URI uri) {
033                super(uri);
034        }
035        
036        @Override
037        protected Stream<? extends org.nasdanika.graph.Element> loadElements(InputStream inputStream, Map<?, ?> options) throws IOException {
038                try {
039                        document = loadDocument(inputStream);
040                        URI resourceURI = getURI();
041                        return document.stream()
042                                .filter(org.nasdanika.drawio.Element.class::isInstance)
043                                .map(org.nasdanika.drawio.Element.class::cast)
044                                .filter(e -> {
045                                        URI elementURI = e.getURI();
046                                        return elementURI != null && resourceURI.equals(elementURI);
047                                });
048                } catch (ParserConfigurationException | SAXException e) {
049                        throw new NasdanikaException(e);
050                }
051        }
052
053        /**
054         * Loads document from an {@link InputStream}. This implementation calls Document.load().
055         * Override to implement document pre-processing, e.g. token replacement.
056         * @param inputStream
057         * @return
058         * @throws IOException
059         * @throws ParserConfigurationException
060         * @throws SAXException
061         */
062        protected Document loadDocument(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException, ParserConfigurationException, SAXException {
063                return Document.load(inputStream, getURI().trimFragment());
064        }
065
066        @Override
067        protected void doSave(OutputStream outputStream, Map<?, ?> options) throws IOException {
068                if (document == null) {
069                        try {
070                                document = Document.create(false, getURI());
071                        } catch (ParserConfigurationException e) {
072                                throw new NasdanikaException(e);
073                        }
074                }
075                update(document);
076                try (Writer writer = new OutputStreamWriter(outputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
077                        try {
078                                writer.write(document.save(null));
079                        } catch (TransformerException e) {
080                                throw new NasdanikaException(e);
081                        }
082                }
083        }
084
085        /**
086         * Override to update document with model data.
087         * @param document Document to update. It may be a previously loaded document or a new empty document for new resources.
088         */
089        protected void update(Document document) {}
090        
091        @Override
092        public URI encode() {
093                try {
094                        return document.toDataURI(true);
095                } catch (TransformerException | IOException e) {
096                        throw new NasdanikaException("Error encoding document to URI: " + e, e);
097                }
098        }
099                        
100}
